programme.title: A Time to Kill
Die Jury
programme.desc: Directed by Joel Schumacher. With Matthew McConaughey, Sandra Bullock, Samuel L. Jackson, Kevin Spacey. In Canton, Mississippi, a fearless young lawyer and his assistant defend a black man accused of murdering two white men who raped his ten-year-old daughter, inciting violent retribution and revenge from the Ku Klux Klan.

credits.actor: Sandra Bullock, Matthew McConaughey, Samuel L. Jackson, Kevin Spacey, Donald Sutherland

programme.desc: Directed by John Dahl. With Steve Zahn, Paul Walker, Leelee Sobieski, Jessica Bowman. Three young people on a road trip from Colorado to New Jersey talk to a trucker on their CB radio, then must escape when he turns out to be a psychotic killer.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
Criminal Minds
Criminal Minds
programme.desc: Created by Jeff Davis. With Matthew Gray Gubler, Kirsten Vangsness, A.J. Cook, Joe Mantegna. The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strike again.

credits.actor: Joe Mantegna, Shemar Moore, Matthew Gray Gubler, A. J. Cook, Kirsten Vangsness

programme.desc: Created by Tom Kapinos. With Tom Ellis, Lauren German, Kevin Alejandro, D.B. Woodside. He settles in Los Angeles - the City of Angels.

programme.desc: Directed by Aleksey Sidorov. With Alexander Petrov, Irina Starshenbaum, Viktor Dobronravov, Vinzenz Kiefer. In 1944, a courageous group of Russian soldiers managed to escape from German captivity in a half-destroyed legendary T-34 tank. Those were the times of unforgettable bravery, fierce fighting, unbreakable love, and legendary miracles.

programme.title: Mes meilleurs copains
programme.desc: Cinq potes approchant la quarantaine se retrouvent dans la maison de Richard, à l'occasion de la venue à Paris de Bernadette Legranbois, l'ancienne chanteuse du groupe qu'ils formaient tous les six au début des années 1970, et qui les avait quittés vingt ans auparavant pour faire carrière à Montréal. Entre éclats de rire, souvenirs des années 1970, flash-back, et remises en questions, quelques vieilles rancunes et histoires ressurgissent.
